resource_data_description.resource_data:
<nsdl_dc:nsdl_dc xmlns:nsdl_dc="http://ns.nsdl.org/nsdl_dc_v1.02/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/" schemaVersion="1.02.000" xsi:schemaLocation="http://ns.nsdl.org/nsdl_dc_v1.02/ http://ns.nsdl.org/schemas/nsdl_dc/nsdl_dc_v1.02.xsd">
  <dc:identifier xsi:type="dct:URI">http://www.bioone.org/perlserv/?request=get-document&doi=10.1641%2FB570705</dc:identifier>
  <dc:date xsi:type="dct:W3CDTF">2007-07-01</dc:date>
  <dc:title>Mentoring Women in the Biological Sciences: Is Informatics Leading the Pack?</dc:title>
  <dc:description>The article from the 2007 July/August issue of BioScience discusses the role of mentoring for women pursuing careers in biological informatics. Women have typically been an underrepresented group studying science, engineering and mathematics. Marcie McClure has started the "Women in Bioinformatics" seminar series at Montana State University to support and engage women in this field. Mentoring plays a key role in allowing students to take on a more interdisciplinary scope of research.</dc:description>
  <dc:subject>Journal article/Issue</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Teacher</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Undergraduate lower division 13-14</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Undergraduate upper division 15-16</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Graduate</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>General public & informal education</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Continuing education</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Education</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>Research</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>informatics</dc:subject>
  <dc:subject>women</dc:subject>
  <dc:creator>Samantha Katz (;)</dc:creator>
  <dc:publisher>AIBS;</dc:publisher>
  <dc:rights>The copyright materials for Eye on Education are :AIBS authorizes the copying, distribution, and display of this material under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 2.5 license. Under this license, you must attribute the materials as "Copyright AIBS. Used with permission," and for any reuse or distribution you must make clear to others the license terms of this material. You may not use this material for commercial purposes, nor may you alter, transform, or build upon this material. Please see http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.5/ for license details.</dc:rights>
  <dc:identifier xsi:type="nsdl_dc:ResourceHandle">hdl:2200/20080618223450274T</dc:identifier>
  <dc:type xsi:type="nsdl_dc:NSDLType">Periodical</dc:type>
  <dc:type xsi:type="nsdl_dc:NSDLType">Reference Material</dc:type>
  <dc:format xsi:type="dct:IMT">text/html</dc:format>
  <dc:format xsi:type="dct:IMT">text</dc:format>
  <dc:subject>Education</dc:subject>
  <dc:language>English</dc:language>

</nsdl_dc:nsdl_dc>
